challenges.formInTargetLanguage: Ni Bilbokoa naiz, baina Donostian bizi naiz.
challenges.meaningInSourceLanguage: I am from Bilbao, but I live in San Sebastian.

phrase.definition:
Inessive case
NON case, not a word

challenges.formattedSolution: Ni Bilbokoa naiz, baina Donostian bizi naiz.
I am from Bilbao, but I live in San Sebastian.
